title: Welcome, dear challenge owner.
subTitle: Thank you for providing a work-learning environment.
description: For us to unite you with your talents, we need to ask you a few short questions. Answering the questions will take approximately 5 minutes. Your answers will be posted on the Koios website if approved by the Koios Community Members.
discordTitle: Please find us in the Discord for further questions:
discordDescription: You can leave us a message via channel #blackbird-connect
one: Fill in the form via the link below
two: We will get in contact to go over the details about your posting
three: Your job listing will be posted!
